item.title: Flight Deck Window Heat Systems – No. 2 (side) Windows

numlitem.para: Both No. 1 (fwd) window heaters are operative, and
Observe EICAS advisory message "L(R) SIDE WINDOW".

placard.para: Placard Window Heat System panel "(location) WINDOW HEAT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Turn affected side Window Heat Switch ON.
Touch affected side windows to confirm if side Window Heat #2 and/or #3 are inoperative.
If #2 side Window Heat is inoperative, pull and collar affected side window power circuit breaker:
